title: Mr
name: Lawrence Schobs
research_area: Health and Medical Sciences, Data-centric Engineering, Science
short_biography: I am a third year PhD student researching medical image analysis with deep learning. I focus on landmark localization and estimating uncertainty.
research_interests_summary: computer vision, medical image analysis, landmark localization, segmentation, uncertainty estimation

title: Mr
name: Mohammod Suvon
research_area: Health and Medical Sciences, Data-centric Engineering
research_interests_terms: Computer vision, Machine learning, Natural language processing
short_biography: Mohammod Suvon completed his bachelor's degree in Computer Science and Engineering from North South University, Dhaka, Bangladesh. He has recently completed his Master's in Computer Science with speech and language processing at the University of Sheffield, UK. Currently, he is working as a research support engineer under Dr. Hiping Lu.
research_interests_summary: His current research interest is in multimodal learning on clinical datasets. He is currently working with EHR data on Pulmonary Atrial Hypertension patients to predict one-year mortality.

title: Dr
name: Shuo Zhou
research_area: Health and Medical Sciences, Data-centric Engineering
short_biography:
I am an academic fellow in machine learning at the Machine Learning Research Group, Department of Computer Science, University of Sheffield.

My current research focuses on developing interpretable machine learning methods and tools for medical image analysis. I am a co-creator and core developer of open-source library PyKale, which provides a range of accessible multi-modal and transfer learning algorithms.

I serve as a reviewer of IEEE Transactions on Neural Networks and Learning Systems and IEEE Transactions on Cognitive and Developmental Systems. I also served as a PC member of IJCAI 2022. I am an awardee of Post-Doctoral Enrichment Awards (PDEA) 2022, offered by the Alan Turing Institute.
research_interests_summary: Interpretable Machine Learning, Medical Image Analysis
